name: Bungo Stray Dogs: Tales of the Lost
name_original: Bungo Stray Dogs: Tales of the Lost
description:
Bungo Stray Dogs: Tales of the Lost is a puzzle game developed by Ambition co.,ltd.. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Bungo Stray Dogs: Tales of the Lost on Android. You can purchase the game on Google Play.
